meanings.sent1: The editrix reviewed the article before publishing it.
meanings.sent2: The editrix made sure the magazine was error-free.
meanings.sent3: The editrix found a typo and couldn't resist correcting it.
meanings.sent4: She was the editrix of the school newspaper, shaping stories like a sculptor.
meanings.sent5: The editrix's keen eye caught even the smallest mistakes.

meanings.sent1: As an editrix, she polished the manuscript until it shone.
meanings.sent2: The editrix worked tirelessly to improve the text.
meanings.sent3: The editrix rearranged the paragraphs for fun, just because she could.
meanings.sent4: Her role as an editrix transformed the document into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The editrix's edits elevated the writing to a new level.
